text: Fredrik Lassas (born 1 October 1996) is a Finnish footballer, who most recently played for HIFK. ==Career== He is a former youth talent of FC Futura of Porvoo. He has played for FC Honka and HJK as a youth player as well.http://www.palloliitto.fi/sites/default/files/liitteet/pelaajat_8.11.2013.xls His performances have earned him call-ups for youth national teams on regular basis.http://www.uusimaa.fi/artikkeli/107143-porvoolainen-fredrik-lassas-on- maajoukkueen-luottomiehia To date, he has represented Finnish youth national team on different levels 46 times in total (as of 5 April 2015) and commonly captains the team. He made his debut in the highest level of Finnish football, Veikkausliiga, on 26 October 2013, substituting Sakari Mattila.http://www.iltasanomat.fi/veikkausliiga/art-1288613893908.html On January 7, 2016 FC Köln confirmed on their website, that they had signed Lassas for their reserve team.ZWEI NEUE FÜR DIE U21, fc-koeln.de, 7 January 2016 ==Accomplishments== \- Promising Footballer of the Year (2014) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Finnish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:HIFK Fotboll players Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Klubi 04 players Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:1. FC Köln II players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Fredrik Lassas
